titleStmt.title: Remarks on several late writings publish'd in English by the Socinians wherein is show'd the insufficiency and weakness of their answers to the texts brought against them by the orthodox : in four letters, written at the request of a Socinian gentleman / by H. de Luzancy ...
titleStmt.author: De Luzancy, H. C. (Hippolyte du Chastelet), d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Warren for Thomas Bennet ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
